title: Checking Prime Numbers in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the topic of prime numbers in JavaScript programming. Specifically, we will learn how to check whether a given number is a prime number or not using a simple algorithm. This knowledge can be useful in a variety of applications, such as cryptography, data security, and number theory.

meta.title: Mastering Prime Number Checking in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the art of prime number detection in JavaScript, a valuable skill for cryptography, data security, and number theory.
meta.keywords: algorithms, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, coding, javascript lab, prime numbers, javascript tutor, programming

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript中检查质数
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探讨JavaScript编程中质数的主题。具体来说，我们将学习如何使用简单算法检查给定数字是否为质数。这些知识在各种应用中都很有用，例如密码学、数据安全和数论。

meta.title: 掌握JavaScript中的质数检查
meta.description: 探索JavaScript中质数检测的技巧，这是密码学、数据安全和数论中的一项宝贵技能。
meta.keywords: 算法, JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 在线JavaScript练习, 编码, JavaScript实验, 质数, JavaScript教程, 编程

verify.name: 验证是否执行了Node命令
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中输入'node'并回车即可运行JavaScript。
